sentences.sContent: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.sCn: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

sentences.sContent: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.sContent_eng: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.sCn: 晶体管后来成为了一项叫做“计算机”的新发明的基础，我想正在阅读本文的你对于这个应该比较熟悉吧。

sentences.sContent: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.sCn: 而当你使用晶体管收音机时，你可以带着它到处走动，时至今日你可以把你收集的唱片装进口袋里。

phrases.pCn: 面结型晶体管；结式晶体管

words.tran: 晶体管化的；装有晶体管的
